name: Dangerous Plane
description:
We must reach the highest score by passing through vertical stalactites with our single engine aircraft.
You have to go through the space between the stalactites.
By using the spacebar, you enable your plane to move up.
When you don't press the spacebar, your plane starts to go down.
Measure how good your reflexes and visual attention are!

Features:

Endless Level
Simple Gameplay
Simple Graphic
